column1: Rummelsburg  is a subdivision or neighborhood (Ortsteil) of the borough (Bezirk) of Lichtenberg of the German capital
Rummelsburg was founded in 1669 and on January 30
column3: with the name of Boxhagen-Rummelsburg. Merged in 1912 in the town of Lichtenberg
column4: in 1920 it was incorporated in Berlin with the Greater Berlin Act.
